message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,000,000. I'm confident this will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think the price is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $750,000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counter-offer.  While I understand your perspective on the price, I believe the true value of this product is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down slightly to $925,000. This reflects a more accurate valuation of its potential benefits.

Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I understand your perspective on the product's value, but I still think $750,000 is a more reasonable price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $875,000. I believe this is a fair compromise that reflects the product's value to me.
